titleStmt.title: Glad tydings of ioy, or A prognostication of peace. Wherein is contained, memorable accidents [brace] past, present, and to come. [brace] proved produced and manifested [brace] by [brace] Scripture, time, and Englands experience. / Collected by J. B. Astro.
titleStmt.author: J. B., Astro.
Booker, John, 1603-1667, attributed name.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the first yeare of Jubilee, 1643.

notesStmt.note: A royalist pamphlet, "J. B. Astro" is probably a pseudonym intended to suggest the authorship of John Booker, Parliamentarian pamphleteer and astrologer.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 10. 1642"; the 3 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
